Articles.Content:
first off, the Duna planetary Transfer Module AKA the 'Achilles' module

![UQbx8t8.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/UQbx8t8.png)

has some design flaws on fuel lines,(i forgot about it OK?)fuel, and engines. 

fuel levels are not quite reasonable and it aint got enuff thrust.

and forgot the Sr. docking port at the back end......

so, what did i do to the DPTS?(see the bottom!)

NEXT!

the Sol'r module for the Kerbstation (not actually named 'Kerbstation'. sorry for the inconvenience.)

![PnRhCDq.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/PnRhCDq.png)

and i found this came option which is Alt+scroll (camera range-thing)

and a design flaw too. its too wobbly in the fairing...![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

![pzo4MqS.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/pzo4MqS.png)

2nd launcher thing. found out that the 1.25m 'circular-izer' stage was making it wobbly. (above the text of course! not below it)

![CEXLvSn.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/CEXLvSn.png)

LIFTOFF!

A few course corrections and burns later.......

![g7cEuKc.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/g7cEuKc.png)

Docked it! Bob went on EVA just to lollylag (or was it Franet....)

and i think i messed up the SP 1x6 sol'r panels position on the core..(the big thing with 2 Mobile Labs, duhhh)

![Ac7Rxej.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/Ac7Rxej.png)

dont think it has a flaw or anything though

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

Conclusion:

well, the DPTS (Achilles) module did not been scrapped or fried instead it went to the Mint-ish moon

the Achilles II shall be launched after the completation of Kerbstation I

(i was trying to mimic the ISS and it was hard)

no camera/beautification/parts/physics enhancer/lag destroyer mod inluded.

I play a stock game coz my computer ant got enuff RAM (1Gb,895mb usable:c)

But that doesn't stop me from playing KSP! (planning to add RAM today or tomorrow( 4Gb x 2 +Dual Channel Baby! w00t!![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)))

sorry about the low graphics-I blame the RAM for this!
